ls":"Interface that apply to an entire collection","params":{"creatorAddress":"The address of the creator of the collection","creatorName":"String representation of the creator's name","story":"The story written and attached to the collection"}},"CreatorStory(uint256,address,string,string)":{"details":"This events stores creator stories on chain in the event log","params":{"creatorAddress":"The address of the creator of the token","creatorName":"String representation of the creator's name","story":"The story written and attached to the token id","tokenId":"The token id to which the story is attached"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addCollectionStory(string,string)":{"details":"Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times the creator may write a story.This function MUST emit the CollectionStory event each time it is calledThis function MUST implement logic to restrict access to only the creator","params":{"creatorName":"String representation of the creator's name","story":"The story written and attached to the token id"}},"addCreatorStory(uint256,string,string)":{"details":"Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times the creator may write a story.This function MUST emit the CreatorStory event each time it is calledThis function MUST implement logic to restrict access to only the creatorThis function MUST revert if a story is written to a non-existent token","params":{"creatorName":"String representation of the creator's name","story":"The story written and attached to the token id","tokenId":"The token id to which the story is attached"}},"addStory(uint256,string,string)":{"details":"Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times a collector may written to a non-existent token","params":{"collectorName":"String representation of the collectors's name","story":"The story written and attached to the token id","tokenId":"The token id to which the story is attached"}}},"title":"Transient Labs Story Inscriptions Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"CollectionStory(address,string,string)":{"notice":"Event describing a collection story getting added to a contract"},"CreatorStory(uint256,address,string,string)":{"notice":"Event describing a creator story getting added to a token"},"Story(uint256,address,string,string)":{"notice":"Event describing a collector story getting added to a token"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"addCollectionStory(string,string)":{"notice":"Function to let the creator add a story to the collection they have created"},"addCreatorStory(uint256,string,string)":{"notice":"Function to let the creator add a story to any token they have created"},"addStory(uint256,string,string)":{"notice":"Function to let collectors add a story to any token they own"}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/IStory.sol":"IStory"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/IStory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x78243140ea964a669c46dd5b3ac3e870f1cd03bf61b898d5777ca3c5dc1b786f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4beed66012d920aa658c74147c72cb1c97abdbbd14f8dbbc4e37cf591d560ef7","dweb:/ipfs/QmWLCx25r4oMCTe1GX7LFSWcTk4W6gUaa9MVM8J5NvQiw1"]}},"version":1}

addCollectionStory(string,string).details: Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times the creator may write a story.This function MUST emit the CollectionStory event each time it is calledThis function MUST implement logic to restrict access to only the creator

params.creatorName: String representation of the creator's name
params.story: The story written and attached to the token id

addCreatorStory(uint256,string,string).details: Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times the creator may write a story.This function MUST emit the CreatorStory event each time it is calledThis function MUST implement logic to restrict access to only the creatorThis function MUST revert if a story is written to a non-existent token

params.creatorName: String representation of the creator's name
params.story: The story written and attached to the token id
params.tokenId: The token id to which the story is attached

addStory(uint256,string,string).details: Depending on the implementation, this function may be restricted in various ways, such as      limiting the number of times a collector may write a story.This function MUST emit the Story event each time it is calledThis function MUST implement logic to restrict access to only the owner of the tokenThis function MUST revert if a story is written to a non-existent token

params.collectorName: String representation of the collectors's name
params.story: The story written and attached to the token id
params.tokenId: The token id to which the story is attached

addCollectionStory(string,string).notice: Function to let the creator add a story to the collection they have created

addCreatorStory(uint256,string,string).notice: Function to let the creator add a story to any token they have created

addStory(uint256,string,string).notice: Function to let collectors add a story to any token they own
